title: Adaptive Query Optimization Framework
summary: Designs a database schema to support adaptive query optimization, enabling the database to adjust execution plans based on historical performance data.

title: Secure Data Encryption for Database Storage
summary: Introduces robust encryption mechanisms to protect database storage and ensure data integrity.

title: Suboptimal Query Execution Plans
summary: The query planner selects inefficient execution plans, resulting in slow database performance.

title: Connection Pool Saturation Under Load
summary: High traffic scenarios lead to connection pool exhaustion, causing delays and timeouts for database queries.

title: High Lock Contention on Concurrent Updates
summary: Concurrent updates on the same table lead to excessive lock contention, slowing down transaction processing.

title: Deadlock in Concurrent Transactions
summary: Concurrent database transactions occasionally result in deadlocks, causing query timeouts for users.

title: Replication Lag in High-Load Environments
summary: Data replication between nodes experiences significant lag under high-load conditions, causing outdated data to be served.
